Summary: Persist money rail operations in Postgres
Description: Replace process-local adapter state with durable tenant-scoped operation and provider-event persistence for payout and collection rails.
Acceptance Criteria: Money rail operations and provider events survive API restart and reconcile identically across repeated reads

Summary: Wire API to durable money rail adapter
Description: Use store-backed money rail adapter in API create/status/cancel/ingest flows with deterministic fallback behavior in sandbox.
Acceptance Criteria: All ops money-rail endpoints operate on durable state and existing e2e money-rail tests pass

Description: Emit billable usage events for verified runs settled volume and arbitration usage with immutable audit fields.
Acceptance Criteria: Usage event stream is queryable by tenant and period and matches deterministic replay under repeated inputs

Description: Aggregate billable events into invoice-ready line items with idempotent period close and reconciliation hooks.
Acceptance Criteria: Invoice line-item artifacts are generated deterministically and reconcile to source usage events with zero drift

Description: Launch public /pricing surface with Free Builder Growth Enterprise tiers and value-event pricing details.
Acceptance Criteria: Pricing page renders current plan terms and passes copy review with no contradictions to billing policy docs

Summary: Enable Stripe self-serve checkout by plan
Description: Map pricing plans to Stripe products checkout sessions and subscription lifecycle updates.
Acceptance Criteria: Tenants can upgrade from free to paid via checkout and billing state updates automatically on webhook confirmation

Summary: Enforce plan quotas in API gateway
Description: Apply plan-aware rate and volume caps for verified runs settlement volume and arbitration usage with clear error codes.
Acceptance Criteria: Requests above plan limits are blocked with stable quota error responses and quota counters remain consistent under retries

Summary: Implement overage billing and threshold alerts
Description: Apply overage calculation above included limits and issue 80 percent and 100 percent threshold notifications.
Acceptance Criteria: Overage line items appear in invoice artifacts and alert events fire once per threshold crossing per period

Description: Provide operator queue for open arbitration cases with filters SLA timers and ownership actions.
Acceptance Criteria: Operators can list assign and triage arbitration cases from UI with state changes reflected in API within one refresh interval

Summary: Add arbitration evidence and ruling workspace
Description: Implement case detail panel for evidence review ruling draft and verdict submission with audit trace visibility.
Acceptance Criteria: Rulings submitted from UI generate valid verdict artifacts linked to dispute evidence and pass verification checks

Summary: Ship policy preset packs for budgets and disputes
Description: Provide presets for spend caps holdbacks and dispute windows with one-click apply and rollback.
Acceptance Criteria: Admins can apply preset packs and resulting policy hashes are versioned auditable and restorable

Summary: Expose public verified receipt endpoint and badge
Description: Publish a public receipt endpoint and embeddable badge proving verification status settlement outcome and receipt hash.
Acceptance Criteria: Receipt endpoint returns signed verification summary and badge embed validates against receipt hash with no private data leakage

Description: Create one canonical quickstart for AI tool providers from signup to first live settlement in under 10 minutes.
Acceptance Criteria: New tenant can complete first live settlement by following documented steps and smoke script passes in CI

Summary: Ship three reference integrations for tool providers
Description: Deliver and test three production-like integration templates showing contract proof settlement dispute loops.
Acceptance Criteria: Three reference integrations run end-to-end in CI and each emits a verified settlement artifact

Summary: Launch docs changelog and onboarding email sequence
Description: Publish launch docs changelog and onboarding email journey tied to activation milestones.
Acceptance Criteria: Docs and email sequence are live and triggered by tenant onboarding events without manual intervention

Summary: Publish benchmark report and referral loop
Description: Release benchmark report on verification and settlement performance and launch referral loop for self-serve growth.
Acceptance Criteria: Benchmark report is published and referral funnel captures invite and conversion metrics end-to-end

Summary: Stand up MVSV command dashboard and launch gate
Description: Implement MVSV dashboard with funnel metrics and enforce 30-day launch exit criteria gate for go/no-go.
Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard reports MVSV funnel and launch KPIs daily and go/no-go gate auto-evaluates defined thresholds
